<title level="1" pfs="">[Rhino Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1821)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Rhino Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1821)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 12</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 70

**Counter-Charge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature Strides within reach of the warrior and critically fails to Strike the warrior with a melee weapon; **Effect** The rhino warrior knocks the creature to the ground, and the triggering creature falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) and takes 2d6+5 bludgeoning damage. The rhino warrior is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the end of their next turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pick +14 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing

**Dig In** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The rhino warrior makes two pick Strikes against a creature within reach. The rhino warrior rolls only one attack roll for both Strikes, then compares the result against the creature's AC. The rhino warrior's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.

</column>
name: Rhino Warrior
